mapper.select: select bno, category, title, content, writer, tbl_emp.ename ename, tbl_sharetask.regdate, viewcnt, tbl_sharetask.deptno from tbl_sharetask, tbl_emp where tbl_sharetask.writer = tbl_emp.empno and tbl_sharetask.deptno=#{deptno} order by bno desc
select bno, category, title, content, writer, tbl_emp.ename ename, tbl_sharetask.regdate, viewcnt from tbl_sharetask, tbl_emp where tbl_sharetask.writer=tbl_emp.empno and bno=#{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_sharetask (bno, category, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt, deptno) values (tbl_sharetask_seq.nextval, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate, 0, #{deptno})
mapper.update: update tbl_sharetask set title=#{title}, category=#{category}, content=#{content}, regdate=sysdate where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_sharetask where deptno=#{deptno}

select bno, category, title, content, writer, tbl_emp.ename ename, tbl_sharetask.regdate, viewcnt, tbl_sharetask.deptno from tbl_sharetask, tbl_emp where tbl_sharetask.writer=tbl_emp.empno and tbl_sharetask.deptno=#{deptno} and bno=(select max(bno) from tbl_sharetask where #{bno} > bno)

select bno, category, title, content, writer, tbl_emp.ename ename, tbl_sharetask.regdate, viewcnt, tbl_sharetask.deptno from tbl_sharetask, tbl_emp where tbl_sharetask.writer=tbl_emp.empno and tbl_sharetask.deptno=#{deptno} and bno=(select min(bno) from tbl_sharetask where bno > #{bno})
mapper.update: update tbl_sharetask set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from tbl_sharetask order by serial desc) where rownum between 1 and 5
